ygData.subject: RE: Letter to GZ - Draft 3
ygData.msgSnippet: Just out of curiosity, do spell casters skills (conjuration, abjuration, etc) cap at 200 also?  If they do, it may be hard to argue that our instrument skills
ygData.messageBody:
Just out of curiosity, do spell casters skills (conjuration, abjuration,
etc) cap at 200 also? If they do, it may be hard to argue that our
instrument skills should have higher caps (not that I disagree). If casters
skills cap at 250-255, I'd say we have a damn good arguement.


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 44 Bard
Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: David Lendrum [mailto:Karnek@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 29, 1999 5:15 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Letter to GZ - Draft 3


From: "David Lendrum" <Karnek@...>


>
>From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
>Okay, I haven't been at the office for a few days (which is where I do all
>of my emailing), but I'm back now and have a revised version of the letter
>than I'll be sending to GZ. The point on Selo's and SoW cancelling it has
>been removed, as a fix for this has been put in with the last patch.
>I almost took out the point about our skills capping too low, as a few
>people felt that 40 foraging is adequate, but more people seemed to agree
>that this skill caps too low to be useful, so I'm leaving it. I've added a
>point regarding the lack of instrument information when right clicking on a
>song in our spellbooks (as suggested by John).
>I'm starting to lose my steam on this now, so if there are no further
>comments/corrections/suggestions/ additions, this will be the version that
I
>send in.
>
>
>Elwyn Heartstring
>Level 43 Bard
>Erollisi Marr
Another thing you might want to add is it is near impossible to stack your
high level songs (I miss on average 20-30 notes a fight trying to twist
cessation and cresendo) So if ya think you are smashing buttons now just
wait =) Maybe add in that our instrument skills should not be capped at 200
but 250 or 255.. (Why on earth would they want to cap us in these skills??)
I am fearing the thought of stacking Cessation and Verses...
As for skills the only one I am partial to is track...nice high cap ; )
maybe hide would be good if they didn't cap it insanely low.
Karnek D'Jester
L48 Bard of Erollisi Marr
